app_descript:
Brief Overview:

The Invigilator is a robust solution designed to uphold the academic integrity of online assessments. Confronted with the common malpractices in online examinations, such as impersonation and unauthorized help, this app provides a suite of security tools tailored to the needs of educational institutions. It presents an amalgam of features to ensure that exams are conducted fairly, all within a reasonable price point, ensuring widespread accessibility.
